question: You paid a refundable deposit when you rented an appartment.You left the appartment in good condition but the landlord won't return your deposits. Write a letter to landlord.In your letter   Explain why you are writing   Ask for teh return of your deposits   Inform the landlord of possible legal action
text: I am writing this to bring your attention to the conversation that we had  the other day, about the apartment rental.

I have clearly followed the agreement that we signed before renting out the apartment and I have returned it to you without causing any damage to it. I remember you admired my behaviour several times during your random visits to check the apartment status.

As I followed my part of the agreement according to what we signed, I would appreciate it if you follow the same in your part of the agreement. Hence, I kindly request you to return my deposit as it was refundable.
If you do not refund it on or before the 25th of September, I regret to inform you that I will take legal action against you to recover my deposit.
I would appreciate your immediate attention to this matter, in order to stop the possible consequences.
